insurance: We accept various PPO dental plans and Denti-cal (Medi-cal). Please call to verify your coverage.
implant: Our doctors have years of experience in dental implant surgery. A consultation and exam are required.

dentists.name: Dr. Boung Y Kim
dentists.title: DDS
dentists.bio: Dr. Kim has years of experience in implant surgery with the admirable number of weekly surgeries. He focuses on patient's satisfaction, comfort, and long-term dental health.

dentists.name: Dr. Danny Do
dentists.title: DDS
dentists.bio: Dr. Do is dedicated to gentle dentistry and helps patients feel informed and confident in their care. His excellent, gentle, and patient root canal treatment procedure is favorable by many patients
